title: Italian Sauteed Sweet Pepper Skillet (Optional Chicken Sausage)

instructions.default: Heat in an oiled skillet over medium, stirring.
instructions.Frozen Pint: Defrost. Heat in an oiled skillet over medium, stirring.
instructions.Frozen Pint / VEGGIE: Defrost. Heat in an oiled skillet over medium, stirring.
instructions.Frozen Pint / Sausage: Defrost. Heat in an oiled skillet over medium, stirring.
